titleStmt.title: Two consolatory letters written to the right honorable the Countess of Westmorland The first upon the occasion of the death of Sr Roger Townshend, Baronet: the second upon the death of Mrs Anne Cartwright, Her Honour's children by Sir Roger Townshend, Baronet, her former husband.
titleStmt.author: Hodges, Thomas, d. 1688.

titleStmt.title: Two consolatory letters written to the right honorable the Countess of Westmorland The first upon the occasion of the death of Sr Roger Townshend, Baronet: the second upon the death of Mrs Anne Cartwright, Her Honour's children by Sir Roger Townshend, Baronet, her former husband.
titleStmt.author: Hodges, Thomas, d. 1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A. Maxwell, for Samuel Gellibrand at the Golden Ball in St. Paul's Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Each letter signed by Thomas Hodges.
Imperfect? Pgs. 2 and 3 lacking or not microfilmed.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
